Awesome game! Even though I feel like I am about to cut my hand by simply looking at the low-res models of 2007. I am still shocked by how cool the concept is. To be honest non of the puzzles are actually that hard, but the story and the gameplay was entertaining enough for me to want to play the other game. 10/10 recommended.
It's the best puzzle game EVER!

This game is great. Its storyline its good, the mechanics are good, and so is the cake :). Ok, putting away the jokes, i love this game, coming from Valve. Even though they've had a rough time making games, its pretty good. Play now, and it'll be one of the best games you'll play. I recommend also buying the sequel, which is even better.
Sincerely, your favorite game reviewer,
koyohedrick
yes absolutely recommend!!! the puzzles are fun and the vibes are immaculate!!!

Opening up the game for the first time, you see a white checkered room through a camera-lens with the menu in front, observing the room. At the center of the latter is an enclosed glass apparatus containing a toilet, a radio, a fragile mug, a clipboard of information, but more questionably, an enclosed stasis relaxation vault. But whom is the vault supposed to contain? 
Starting a new game you find out that you are no longer observing, but you are in the chamber. You can see behind you cameras observing, and above an observation room:  empty. After a brief moment of gaining your bearings of the environment, a female-computer voice greets you, but you are unable to see people. And most will fail to hear these specific words that make the entire game interesting:  "...welcome to the Aperture-Science *computer-aided* Enrichment Center". So here is the question:
What happened to the people in the observation rooms if this is only computer-aided?

I really liked this game but 6 hours to reach the end was a bit disappointing.

A fun puzzle game with an interesting (as well as unsettling) atmosphere and characters. This game is pretty short but it's definitely sweet. This game along with Half-Life 2 and its episodes really highlight just how well the Source Engine works. This game is definitely worth playing even if it is short.
very good game it look me 3 hours to complete so yeah loved the game

I've been playing this game since it came out, had it on my old console. No matter what game I play portal will always be my favorite. Challenging yourself to see how much faster you can do it, or how many shots you can do it in, or seeing how creative you can be with the solutions! No matter how many times I play it, I always manage to find a different aspect of the game to enjoy!
My favorite game.  Very challenging and lots of fun.  Highly recommended.

Присутствуют сцены насилия над друзьями, а так же вечеринка с тортиком тут так себе... В общем великолепная игра с необычной механикой порталов. В игре нужно включать логику, понравилась забавная озвучка. Прохождение не долгое. К покупке советую.
